Darth Maul Wikipedia Darth Maul From Wikipedia free encyclopedia Jump navigation Jump search Star Wars character Darth Maul Star Wars character Ray Park as Darth Maul in Star Wars Episode Phantom Menace First appearance Phantom Menace Last appearance Solo Star Wars Story Created by George Lucas Portrayed by Ray Park Voiced by Peter Serafinowicz Episode Sam Witwer Lego Star Wars Empire Strikes Out Clone Wars Rebels Battlefront II Solo Star Wars Story Gregg Berger Star Wars Episode Phantom Menace video game David W Collins Elite Squadron Stephen Stanton Battlefront II Jess Harnell Star Wars Demolition Star Wars Galactic Battlegrounds Star Wars Racer Revenge Lee Tockar Droid Tales Information Species Dathomirian Zabrak Gender Male Occupation Sith apprentice Crime lord Affiliation Sith Order Shadow Collective Crimson Dawn Family Savage Opress brother Feral Opress brother Mother Talzin mother Home Dathomir Darth Maul fictional character in Star Wars franchise Trained as Darth Sidious s first apprentice he serves as Sith Lord master wielding double bladed lightsaber He first appears in Star Wars Episode Phantom Menace portrayed by Ray Park voiced by Peter Serafinowicz Despite his apparent demise in that film at hands Obi Wan Kenobi he later returned in Star Wars Clone Wars animated television series made further appearances in Star Wars Rebels series film Solo Star Wars Story all voiced by Sam Witwer Contents Characteristics Concept creation Portrayal Appearances Films Phantom Menace Solo Star Wars Story Animated series Clone Wars Rebels Comics Darth Maul Darth Maul Son Dathomir Novels Ahsoka Legends Comics Novels Darth Maul Shadow Hunter Darth Maul Saboteur Maul Lockdown In popular culture Darth Maul fan film Darth Maul kids viral videos References Further reading External links Characteristics edit Concept creation edit After getting frustrated with drawing production designer Gavin Bocquet Iain McCaig started covering it in tape Both he Lucas liked result described as kind Rorschach pattern final drawing had McCaig s own face with skin removed some Rorschach experimentation dropping ink onto paper folding it in half then opening Maul s facial tattoos were inspired by indigenous peoples Brazil Maul described as thing nightmares his art design finished Darth Maul s head originally had feathers based on prayer totems but Creature Effects crew led by Nick Dudman interpreted those feathers as horns modifying his features into those common in popular depictions devil His clothing was also modified from tight body suit with muscle pattern Sith robe based on samurai pleats lightsaber battles involved much jumping spinning running rolling Another concept had Maul masked figure something that could rival Darth Vader while senatorial characters would sport painted tattooed faces It was later decided apply painted tattooed faces Maul rather than senator Portrayal edit Darth Maul was physically portrayed by actor martial artist Ray Park in Phantom Menace character was voiced by comedian voice actor director Peter Serafinowicz in Phantom Menace Lego videogame adaptation prequel trilogy while Samuel Witwer performed character s voice in animated series Clone Wars Rebels in live action movie Solo Star Wars Story Actors Gregg Berger Jess Harnell Stephen Stanton Clint Bajakian David W Collins have all voiced him in Legends adaptations minor appearances Appearances edit Films edit Phantom Menace edit Introduced in Star Wars Episode Phantom Menace Darth Maul ordered by his master Darth Sidious capture Queen Padm Amidala On Tatooine Maul fights Qui Gon Jinn while approaching Queen s starship While Anakin Skywalker gets on board Qui Gon engages Maul in lightsaber duel but Jedi master escapes Eventually Maul fights Qui Gon Obi Wan Kenobi simultaneously Maul duels Qui Gon eventually kills him Although Obi Wan almost knocked down into shaft he uses Force propel himself out pit equips himself with Qui Gon s lightsaber bisect Maul after which two separated pieces Maul s body fall into shaft Solo Star Wars Story edit Main article Solo Star Wars Story Ray Park reprises his role from Phantom Menace as Darth Maul with Sam Witwer providing voice reprising his role from animated series Clone Wars Star Wars Rebels Maul revealed be master crime syndicate Crimson Dawn which crime lord Dryden Vos answers Qi ra tells Maul that Vos his men were killed by Tobias Beckett his accomplices but neglects name Han Solo Chewbacca Maul commands her meet with him on Dathomir tells her that they will work more closely from now on igniting his lightsaber Animated series edit Clone Wars edit Darth Maul s origins are elaborated upon in third season animated series Star Wars Clone Wars which takes place between Attack Clones Revenge Sith Maul explained have been warrior Nightbrother clan on planet Dathomir inhabited by dominant Nightsister witchcraft society led by Mother Talzin Maul s tattoos are described as markings warrior Talzin instructs Savage Opress find his long lost brother In fourth season Maul revealed be alive having survived his presumed death at Obi Wan s hands Having ended up on junkyard planet via dumpster craft Maul has suffered from amnesia since Obi Wan defeated him Savage finds Maul brings him devastated Dathomir Talzin restores Maul s mind gives him robotic legs Maul Savage set about plan exact revenge on Obi Wan Maul proceeds attack colonial village draw Obi Wan make an attempt on his life only be thwarted due Asajj Ventress s unexpected appearance collect bounty on Savage Maul Savage overpower Obi Wan Ventress but Maul lets them go deciding await another opportunity In fifth season Maul takes Savage as his apprentice begins building criminal empire Needing followers they travel Florrum manage convince Weequay pirate Jiro his crew join them betray leader Hondo Ohnaka Maul s pirates attack Hondo s loyal forces Maul once again duels Obi Wan while Savage fights kills Jedi Master Adi Gallia Obi Wan draws two brothers away from pirates engaging them in duel Obi Wan though outnumbered cuts off Savage s arm While Maul Savage are in process retreating Hondo s crew open fire at them shoot off one Maul s robotic legs Maul s ship blasted by missile as it attempts take flight but Maul Savage manage escape using one emergency pods After several days they are found floating in dead space close death by Mandalorian Death Watch warriors led by Pre Vizsla They are taken back Vizla s settlement Maul s damaged cybernetic legs are replaced with new prosthetic that resembles more humanoid form while Savage fitted with mechanical arm Maul offers Vizsla chance reclaim Mandalore by recruiting Black Sun Pyke Syndicate Jabba Hutt s minions create criminal syndicate named Shadow Collective From Maul engineers Vizsla s rise power he orders his henchmen attack Mandalore so Death Watch can arrest them appear as heroes denizens have long lived under Duchess Satine Kryze s pacifist rule Vizsla betrays Maul imprisoning him Savage Easily breaking free Maul challenges Vizsla duel take over Death Watch Mandalore he succeeds in killing Vizsla claims his former co conspirator s darksaber He wins loyalty most Death Watch members but Bo Katan retreats along with those loyal previous leader Maul then puts disgraced former prime minister Almec whom Satine had imprisoned corruption in power as puppet leader solidifying his control over Mandalore Maul anticipates Satine s contacting Jedi Council as part his plan get Obi Wan Mandalore Once Obi Wan arrives Maul captures him murders Satine in front him hoping make Jedi suffer as much as he once did Obi Wan later freed by Katan s Death Watch faction Maul senses Darth Sidious arriving on Mandalore Although impressed with his former apprentice s survival Sidious declares Maul rival uses Force push choke him Savage He then engages them both in lightsaber combat fatally injuring Savage After Savage dies from his wounds Sidious reminds Maul Rule Two tells him that he has been replaced Enraged Maul pulls out both his lightsaber darksaber proceeds fight Sidious on equal ground but Sidious ultimately defeats him Maul pleads mercy but Sidious ignores him tortures him with blasts Force lightning Sidious reveals that he has no intention killing Maul remarking that he has other uses his former apprentice Maul will return in season in which he duels Ahsoka Tano during Siege Mandalore He will be portrayed by Ray Park using motion capture Rebels edit An older Maul appears in season finale Star Wars Rebels which takes place between Revenge Sith New Hope Tracked by an Imperial Inquisitor named Eighth Brother Maul stranded on ancient Sith world Malachor he discovered among ruins by series protagonist Ezra Bridger Introducing himself as Old Master seeking revenge against Sidious Maul leads Ezra into an ancient Sith temple they discover holocron that Maul claims can give them knowledge needed defeat Sith After recovering it two find Ezra s master Kanan Jarrus former Jedi Ahsoka Tano locked in battle with Eighth Brother They also find Inquisitors known as Fifth Brother Seventh Sister have been pursuing rebels some time Maul having cast aside title Darth reveals new lightsaber disguised as walking stick joins Jedi in battling enemies including Darth Vader After Inquisitors retreat Maul wins Jedi s trust by denouncing Sith tells them that he cannot defeat Vader on his own Working together he Jedi ascend towards top temple successfully kill all three Inquisitors Then Maul reveals his intention take Ezra as his apprentice having already tricked him into activating temple After blinding Kanan Maul briefly duels Ahsoka before facing Kanan again only be knocked off temple s edge However he survives fall escapes Malachor in Eighth Brother s TIE fighter Months later Maul takes Ghost s crew hostage threatens kill them unless Kanan Ezra bring both Sith Jedi holocrons him Maul takes crew remote base in Outer Rim he awaits Kanan Ezra s arrival Then holocrons are hazardously united allowing Ezra Maul see visions desires Ezra sees images way destroy Sith images including twin suns while Maul sees vision his own Kanan begs Ezra look away before he sees much dark side while Maul tells him ignore Kanan keep looking Ezra heeds his master s words breaks off connection which causes great explosion Maul escapes in confusion uttering He lives Maul reappears after finding rebels secret base He tells Ezra that connection was severed they got bits pieces each other s visions After holocrons were destroyed Maul discovered another way get information he needed He travels Dathomir with Ezra recreates Nightsister spell temporarily meld his Ezra s minds After this completed Ezra Maul realize that they are both looking Obi Wan Kenobi In episode Twin Suns Maul shown lost on Tatooine He decides use Ezra lure Obi Wan out hiding During confrontation Maul deduces that Obi Wan not only hiding but protecting someone In swift duel Obi Wan fatally wounds Maul As he lies dying in Obi Wan s arms Maul asks if person he protecting Chosen One Obi Wan replies that he Maul declares that this Chosen One will avenge them dies peacefully Comics edit This section needs expansion can help by adding it June Darth Maul edit In Marvel released Star Wars Darth Maul issue prequel series centered on Darth Maul before events Phantom Menace Darth Maul Son Dathomir edit Dark Horse Comics produced Darth Maul Son Dathomir based on scripts storyboards an unproduced episode story arc intended Clone Wars Season After killing Savage Opress Darth Sidious takes Maul Separatist prison Count Dooku tortures him information about Shadow Collective Prime Minister Almec arranges Maul s escape latter then heads back Zanbar command Death Watch army However he followed by General Grievous his droids battle with Maul Mandalorians While they put up fierce fight Maul his minions are ultimately overwhelmed by droids During battle Maul tears through droid ranks attacks Grievous but overpowered forced retreat Afterwards Maul confers with Mother Talzin revealed be his biological mother plots draw out Sidious by capturing Dooku Grievous scheme works Talzin able restore herself her physical form but she sacrifices herself save Maul Although Maul escapes with company loyal Mandalorians Shadow Collective has disintegrated due conflict with Sidious as Hutts Pykes Black Sun have all abandoned Maul Novels edit Ahsoka edit In flashbacks during novel Star Wars Ahsoka it revealed that during final days Clone Wars Maul his forces were besieged on Mandalore by an army clone troopers led by Ahsoka Tano Captain Rex b During siege Maul confronts duels Ahsoka though he proves be stronger fighter former Jedi outwits him traps him in ray shield However before Maul can be taken into official custody Order enacted clone troopers following Ahsoka turn on her with exception Rex With Rex s life in peril Ahsoka abandons chance killing Maul allowing former Sith escape once again This battle was originally intended be depicted in series finale Clone Wars citation needed Legends edit With acquisition Lucasfilm by Walt Disney Company most licensed Star Wars novels comics produced since originating film Star Wars were rebranded as Star Wars Legends declared non canon franchise in April Comics edit This section does not cite any sources Please help improve this section by adding citations reliable sources Unsourced material may be challenged removed Find sources Darth Maul news newspapers books scholar JSTOR February Learn remove this template message Darth Maul issue comics series published by Dark Horse Comics featuring Darth Maul series set in shortly before Battle Naboo in Episode Phantom Menace story follows Maul in his mission destroy leadership well feared crime syndicate Black Sun Maul spends his time serving under Darth Sidious killing countlessly His main target in series leader Black Sun some time before Prince Xizor takes command it Several sources depict Maul returning from dead in several different forms story Resurrection from Star Wars Tales depicts cult creating duplicate Maul as replacement Darth Vader only Vader kill him story Phantom Menaces in Star Wars Tales set after Return Jedi depicts Luke Skywalker visiting Maul s home planet Iridonia in an ambassadorial capacity he faces solid state hologram Maul projected from Maul s salvaged brain as part scientist s attempt recreate Maul as Iridonia s champion Luke recognizes disruption that Maul s existence causing in Force shuts down life support systems keeping brain alive In Dark Horse Comics published Star Wars Visionaries compilation non canonical short comics made by creators Revenge Sith One story Old Wounds depicts Maul with longer horns on his head having survived his bisection at Obi Wan s hands with his missing bottom half replaced with cybernetic legs similar those General Grievous his eventual revival in Clone Wars He follows Obi Wan throughout galaxy finally tracking him down on Tatooine few years after events Revenge Sith Maul taunts Obi Wan saying that after he kills him he will take toddler aged Luke Skywalker his master Emperor Palpatine Maul plans kill Vader resume his rightful place at Palpatine s side He ignites his new double bladed lightsaber engages Obi Wan in duel but Obi Wan again bests him in combat cutting off his opponent s horns Maul killed by blaster bolt head from Owen Lars Obi Wan thanks Owen says he will take Maul s body into desert burn it Novels edit In early young adult novel entitled Star Wars Wrath Darth Maul was released by Scholastic Maul also featured prominently in comic series starting in this period Clone Wars Sith Hunters Darth Maul Death Sentence Set around various episodes Clone Wars that featured Maul two books detail his Savage Opress journey across galaxy as they seek vengeance on Jedi In novel Darth Plagueis titular Sith lord sends his apprentice Darth Sidious Force rich world Dathomir Dathomiri witch Nightsister senses Sidious power in Force approaches him Assuming he Jedi she begs him take her Zabrak infant son She realizes that Sidious not Jedi explains she trying save her son from Nightsister named Talzin killed Maul s father It implied that Maul has twin brother that Talzin only aware one child Sidious realizes infant strong in Force would become threat if found by Jedi Concealing existence his own master Sidious raises Maul believe that he Sith apprentice but he actually intends him be an expendable minion rather than an heir Maul himself acknowledges his shortcomings such as his limited understanding politics even as he tries become true Sith Darth Maul Shadow Hunter edit Darth Maul Shadow Hunter novel by Michael Reaves released on February It prequel novel occurring about six months before events Phantom Menace cover art was by David Stevenson Del Rey aired TV commercial novel in citation needed As portrayed in novel Maul was raised by Sidious as long as he can remember Sidious then trains Maul as Sith marking his body with Sith tattoos Maul initially goes on several missions terror his master killing politicians crime bosses merchants warlords Sidious meets secretly with his Neimoidian contacts in Trade Federation finalize details in plan blockade Naboo One member delegation missing suspecting betrayal Sidious orders Maul hunt down traitor Maul completes this task but learns that traitor had recorded proof Sith s manipulation Naboo blockade on holocron sell profit suicidal attack by Trade Federation hired bounty hunter interferes with Maul s plan holocron purchased by Corellian con man named Lorn Pavan Pavan realizes nature information seeks take it Jedi Temple Maul his part ordered by Sidious retrieve holocron kill Pavan anyone else might have information Meanwhile Jedi Padawan named Darsha Assant faced with Jedi trials become full fledged Jedi Knight tries save member Black Sun which Maul had crippled in Saboteur Pavan attempts do business with Hutt crime lord in one lower levels in Coruscant but Maul arrives kills Hutt Pavan escapes into caverns they meet Darsha her master Jedi begin escorting Pavan his droid temple but Maul soon attacks them Darsha s master slain while attempting buy time others Pavan Darsha escape various dangers Coruscant s subterranean levels before finding themselves in another battle Darsha realizing that she cannot defeat Maul draws out duel long enough Pavan s droid repair carbonite freezing unit seal Pavan droid inside it Darsha plunges her lightsaber into pile volatile gas canisters killing her causing an explosion that Maul barely escapes Upon surveying scene Maul feels no trace Pavan in Force not realizing that carbonite hibernation has made his lifeforce undetectable An automatic timer frees Pavan from hibernation he goes after Maul on his own Pavan follows Maul Republic space station sneaks up on Maul stunning him momentarily before he awakens severes Pavan s right hand pursues him through station s service tubes Pavan barely makes it into public area Maul cannot follow unwittingly gives holocron Senator Palpatine Naboo not realizing that Palpatine Maul s Sith Master After recovering Pavan starts leave his quarters only be confronted by Maul kills him as worthy opponent Darth Maul Saboteur edit Darth Maul Saboteur short story by James Luceno It was released in ebook form with length equivalent about printed pages on February It was also published in back paperback edition Michael Reaves Darth Maul Shadow Hunter story about Darth Maul takes place roughly year before Phantom Menace It recounts Maul s first solo mission attempt destroy two mining companies so Trade Federation can take them over Maul Lockdown edit Maul Lockdown Star Wars novel written by Joe Schreiber released by Del Rey Books on January It was last novel be released in Star Wars Legends line franchise Before events Phantom Menace Sith lords Darth Plagueis Darth Sidious send disciple Darth Maul galactic prison recover powerful weapon an insidious gambling empire pits galaxy s most terrible criminals against each other in gladiatorial combat Maul must face Jabba Hutt various other horrifying obstacles complete his mission In popular culture edit Main article Cultural impact Star Wars Since release Phantom Menace Darth Maul has proven be popular character IGN named Darth Maul th greatest Star Wars character noting countless characters walk in out Star Wars saga none looks acts more badass than Darth Maul Darth Maul related merchandise was popular among Hasbro Star Wars toy lines with plastic recreations his double bladed lightsaber various action figures in his likeness developed Darth Maul was focal point toy marketing campaign surrounding re release Phantom Menace being featured on packaging toy line Darth Maul fan film edit Main article Darth Maul Apprentice Darth Maul fan film titled Darth Maul Apprentice was released Darth Maul kids viral videos edit Main article Star Wars Kid It has been suggested that Star Wars Kid be merged into this article Discuss Proposed since July At least two videos kids trying imitate Darth Maul have gone viral Star Wars Kid which spawned an internet meme Another in December an year old Ontario boy went viral on Internet with video him pretending be Darth Maul displaying his martial arts skills References edit Footnotes Earlier sources identified his body art as Sith markings Anakin Obi Wan were dispatched Mandalore with Ahsoka but were immediately called back Coruscant rescue Chancellor Palpatine thus leading into opening sequence
